snippet.title: Amiga Longplay Ultimate Super Skidmarks
snippet.description:
http://www.recordedamigagames.org

Played by: NPI

This is the updated version of Super Skidmarks, a game released for both AGA Amigas and CD32. There is a total of eight championships you can compete. There are four different versions of Super Skidmarks, the only difference being the sound effects during the gameplay and the selection screen image and music. Here's the championships' timing with different versions used:

Super Skidmarks

- Mini Magic
- Porsche position 06:19

Super Silly Skidmarks

- Midget Madness 14:05
- Beetle Battle 20:56

Super Skidmarks Farm Yard Edition

- California Cows 27:10

Super Skidmarks +

- Truck Tripping 35:24
- Muscle Mayhem 42:44
- Formula Finale 50:08

Also there is a variety of cars you can choose for free matches showed on 53:58 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
